metadata.subject: Louis XVI, King of France, 1754-1793
Monarchy
metadata.title: Opinion de Michel Azéma, député du département de l'Aude, membre du Comité de législation & de la section chargée de la faction du code français par l'Assemblée nationale législative, & membre du même Comité de la Convention nationale, sur le jugement de Louis Capet, dernier roi des François
metadata.creator: Azéma, Michel,1752-1827
Azéma, Michel, 1752-1827
France. Convention nationale
metadata.publisher: A Troyes : De l'imprimerie d'André, imprimeur du départment de l'Aube,
metadata.description: At head of caption: Convention nationale
Publication date based on another edition, published in 1792. Cf. Martin & Walter
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, I, 924
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
